data.message: I have recently become the administrator of a Facebook site for a local not for profit organization. The original site for this group was set up by another individual, and it seems to be tied to his personal site. I believe the site should be tied to the non profit organization, not to one persons FB site. Can you help me with this?

replies.message: Hi Kathy. Are you looking to link a Group to a Page, or are you looking to remove an admin from a Page? Thanks! -Caitlin
